org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config
Class LoggersPlugin

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.LoggersPlugin

@Plugin(name="loggers",
        category="Core")
public final class LoggersPlugin
extends Object

Container of Logger objects.
